label: Yield Wheat(kg/ha)
Description: Wheat yield under normal conditions

label: Yield Soy Bean(kg/ha)
Description: Soy Bean yield under normal conditions

label: Yield Maize (kg/ha)
Description: Maize yield under normal conditions

label: Yield Landsberger Gemenge (kg/ha)
Description: Landsberger Gemenge yield under normal conditions

label: Coefficient of variation
Description: Coefficient of variation (measure of relative variability)

label: Maximum apple tree yield (kg/tree)
Description: Yield of an apple tree at maximum harvest phase

label: Time to first yield estimate (years)
Description: Time until apple reaches first harvest phase (years)

label: First yield estimate in %
Description: Apple yield of first harvest phase in % of maximum yield

label: Time to second yield estimate (years)
Description: Time until apple reaches second harvest phase (years)

label: Second yield estimate in %
Description: Apple yield of second harvest phase in % of maximum yield

label: Lifespan apple tree (years)
Description: Years until apple tree gets removed from system

label: Maximum plum tree yield (kg/tree)
Description: Yield of a plum tree at maximum harvest phase

label: Time to first yield estimate (years)
Description: Time until plum reaches first harvest phase (years)

label: First yield estimate in %
Description: Plum yield of first harvest phase in % of maximum yield

label: Time to second yield estimate (years)
Description: Time until plum reaches second harvest phase (years)

label: Second yield estimate in %
Description: Plum yield of second harvest phase in % of maximum yield

label: Lifespan plum tree (years)
Description: Years until plum tree gets removed from system

label: Timespan until Farmer goes into Pension
Description: Amount of years that simulation is running for/ until farmer goes into pension

label: Ecological benefits of AF system EUR/ha/per year
Description: Ecological benefits including carbon sequestration, increased biodviersity interpreted in a monetary value

label: Social moral benefits of farmer in AF system (EUR/ha/year)
Description: Personal social moral benefits that farmer gains by working in AF system instead of conventional system

label: Subsidies eco scheme trees (EUR/ha of trees/ year)
Description: Subsidies of the eco scheme tree that farmer receives

label: Avaiable area annuals (ha)
Description: Cropping Area that is cultivated by fruit trees

label: Amount of trees per ha
Description: One tree requires 10m², therefore amount of trees per ha is 1000

label: Available area perennials (ha)
Description: Cropping Area that is cultivated by annuals

label: Cost apple tree (EUR/tree)
Description: Investment for a young apple tree  (EUR/tree)

label: Cost plum tree (EUR/tree)
Description: Investment for a young plum tree (EUR/tree)

label: New infrastructure cost (EUR/ha)
Description: New infrastructure that is required for an AF system such as hedges, fences, irrigation system, etc. (EUR/ha)

label: Irrigation cost (EUR/l)
Description: Irrigation cost for young trees (EUR/L)

label: Irrigation amount  (l/tree/year)
Description: Liters of water that young trees require per year (l/tree/year)

label: Rental cost for new harvesting machinery (Eur/ha)
Description: Rental cost for new machinery that is required for AF system (EUR/ha)

label: Machinery maintenance cost (EUR)
Description: Machinery caintenance cost (EUR)

label: Fuel cost (EUR/ha)
Description: Fuel cost of machinery (EUR)

label: Labour cost (EUR/hour)
Description: Labour cost including weeding, harvesting, etc. (EUR/hour)

label: Labour hours (hour/ha)
Description: Labour hours including weeding, harvesting, pruning, etc. (hour/ha)

label: Cost for process of distribution (Eur/ha)
Description: Cost for distribution, including contact with retailers, finding new market and marketing costs

Description: Seed cost wheat (EUR/ha)

Description: Seed cost soy bean (EUR/ha)

label: Seed cost maize (EUR/ha)
Description: Seed cost maize (EUR/ha)

label: Seed cost landsberger gemenge (EUR/ha)
Description: Seed cost lansberger gemenge (EUR/ha)

label: Crop protection cost (Eur/ha)
Description: Action that farmer has to take for crop protection like beneficials or organic pesticides

label: Fertilizer cost (EUR/ha)
Description: Fertilizer cost for wheat (EUR/ha)

label: % chance market and price risks
Description: Probability of market and price risks

label: % chance production risks
Description: Probability of production risks, including pathogens, droughts, flooding events, etc.

label: % chance institutional and policy risks
Description: Probability of institutional and policy risks including reulatory changes, trade policies, etc.

label: % chance personal risk
Description: Probability of personal risk, including death, sickness, community conflicts, etc.

label: % change if market risk event occurs
Description: The percentage change of the affected variable if a market risk event occurs

label: % change if production risk event occurs (AF System)
Description: The percentage change of the affected variable if a production risk event occurs in AF system

label: % change if production risk event occurs (baseline)
Description: The percentage change of the affected variable if a production risk event occurs in conventional system

label: % change if institutional/policy risk event occurs(AF)
Description: The percentage change of the affected variable if a institutional and policy risk event occurs in AF system

label: % change if institutional/policy risk event occurs(baseline)
Description: The percentage change of the affected variable if a institutional and policy risk event occurs in convetional system

label: % change if personal risk event occurs
Description: The percentage change of the affected variable if a personal risk event occurs
